title: Mark's English Sausage Rolls
ingredients: 1 (17.3 ounce) package frozen puff pastry sheets, thawed
1 (16 ounce) package pork sausage meat or ground pork
method: Step 1: Gather all ingredients. Preheat the oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Step 2: Unfold puff pastry sheets. Cut along the fold lines of each sheet to form 6 equal squares for a total of 12 squares.
Step 3: Brush each square with mustard.
Step 4: Divide sausage into 12 equal pieces and roll into small logs. Place one log onto each square.
Step 5: Roll dough around sausage and lightly brush dough with beaten egg to seal.
Step 6: Place rolls onto an ungreased baking sheet. Brush the tops with remaining beaten egg.

Step 7: Bake in the preheated oven for 10 minutes. Check to ensure they aren't burning, then continue to bake until puffed and golden, about 10 more minutes. An instant-read thermometer inserted into the center of a roll should read at least 160 degrees F (70 degrees C).
